assessments.status_rationale: Multiple articles indicate a federal shutdown is ongoing as of 2025-10-03 (e.g., 'The shutdown meant no jobs report', 'Trump Administration Can’t Decide Whether the Shutdown Is Bad or Good', 'Marjorie Taylor Greene Criticizes Senate Republicans for Government Shutdown'). There is no report of a continuing resolution or full-year appropriations having been enacted yet, and the deadline is 2025-10-14.
No coverage in the provided news about state attorneys general filing lawsuits to block distribution or use of newly approved generic mifepristone. Deadline is 2025-10-31.

No item reports Mexico’s Secretariat of Foreign Affairs issuing a formal statement rejecting a 'war on cartels' framing or cross-border military actions. One opinion piece discusses a 'Boat Strike Cartel War,' but not an SRE statement. Deadline is 2025-10-10.
